name: Hypnosia
description:
You are a patient diagnosed with claustrophobia. In order to defeat your "illness" the doctors have put you in a deep hypnosis state. Reach the end and you are cured.

GOOD LUCK!

CONTROLS

W A S D to move
LEFT CLICK  to shoot
SCROLL to switch weapons
RIGHT CLICK to throw grenade
R to reload
E to interact
F for flashlight

HOW TO PLAY

Stay for as little as you can in the narrow places or your claustro-meter will grow and you will start to lose health.

Use the wider spaces and the arcade machines to reduce your claustro-level.

Please play it for the first time without reading the guidelines.
